extendedInfo.description: Coin Machine is a fun variant of the most favored arcade pusher game. It combines a slot machine, coin dozer and a moving cart to add more surprises and triple your fun. Enjoy the game now to push coins, collect prizes, and win the jackpot!Gold treasure:Push down step coins to start the cart. A right step coin will lead you to the gold treasure!A step coin is a coin indicating how many steps the cart will move. Be careful to push down only the one you need!Slot machine:Push coins into the lucky basket to trigger the slot machine. A Silver Crown and a Gold crown in a row? Thatâs the Jackpot! So watch the basket when you push!How to get more coins:Regeneration begins automaticaly when you have less than 50 coins. Pushing down Magic Coins will make your fortune grow faster. There are 7 types of Magic Coins available to help you start a coin rain, set up a coin wall, or simply get more coins and prizes.What to do with prizes:One prize doesnât make any difference, but if you finish a collection of prizes, the reward is big! Thereâre plenty of collections waiting for you to gain.Good luck!==========================Droidhen is the name behind Defender, Defender II, Dinosaur War, Miracle City, Basketball Shot, DH Texas Poker, Gun of Glory, Shoot the Apple and many other top popular games. Droidhen is also marked as top developer by google.==========================

reviews.title: Best ever!
reviews.comment: Level 200! Bad part, nothing changes. No new challenges.
reviews.author: Sandy Raymo

reviews.title: Pretty cool.
reviews.comment: I like the game, but I wish you could get something for the prizes like in coin dozer plus I don\'t like that I can drop two, three coins in the basket, you only get one spin. I should a spin for every single coin.  If not for that would\'ve given 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I loved the game, it has great game play. No hang ups no glitches, I highly recommend it ...thanks for a great game...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A Must Download!
reviews.comment: I love this game, fun, generous coinage. Lots of fun!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: This app is great for past time. Never gets me bored.Easy to play and works great on my phone.
reviews.author: carl bandojo

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: Lots of fun. Very generous in coins. Much better than some of.the other dozer games.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: One of my fave games I like it better than coin dozer though that game is still good I like this one better because it gets your coins back in 15 second I recommend  you install!
reviews.author: Emma Fordyce

reviews.title: Coin Machine
reviews.comment: Lv coin pirates but from what ive read and seen the graphics i thk this is gonna be one of best coin games ive played!! Queenlz
reviews.author: Elizabeth Murray

reviews.title: I like this game but it is full of bugs.
reviews.comment: I am not getting all my prizes on the score bored, what is the piont in a game that doesnt record scores properly? It should give you a spin for every coin you get in basket. What do x p coins do? I would like to sell prizes for coins too. Im not buying stuff and im going to delete it if i get bored. Its a good game for having some control over where the coins go. I like the cart at bottom but you need more coins for that. This could be a great game dev, please improve it.
reviews.author: Jayne Dragon

reviews.title: BEWARE!!! SO ADDICTIVE!!
reviews.comment: Yep its addictive beyond belief hours just fly by. Great fun and if you play shrewdly you wont need to buy crystals or coins, if you do they are reasonably priced. A great game. Excellent work.
reviews.author: Lee Bayley

reviews.title: Nice variation
reviews.comment: A nice enough game for younger children. A help file explaining rules and events would be nice. The coins don\'t always drop where I touch, but who cares? Extra coins fall at random? Why?  It\'s just a timer waster and fun for a while. Pity the table stopped working, but ten times was more than enough.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Holly Barr
reviews.comment: Great game, but some of the prizes don\'t work, like the coin reg. Also when I get the 3 gold crowns it only works half the time. It needs to be fixed. I really like this game but I am thinking about switching to another coin game because of all the quirks. I am glad it is not something that I paid for.
reviews.author: Holly Barr Randall

reviews.title: 1.1.5 not working on Gal s2
reviews.comment: Click on play and game never loads after last update. Also, when it was working didn\'t register all the prizes. One color from each row always stays at 0.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Coin machine
reviews.comment: Great fun,very addictive. Just wish you didnt lose quite so many of the bonuses down the sides
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: Coin game out there. Doesnt try to make you purchase coins. Would be nice if there was more variety with the special coins and the ability to sell the stupid prizes becuase they really have no point to them. It starts to get kind of boring once you get past level 40 but I\'m still playing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Coin bonus
reviews.comment: Doesnt give u the right amount of coins i was off line for 2days and was only given 10coins total rip off
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it..  BUT. .paid for nothing
reviews.comment: I love this game , but after buying coins and crystals,  and never receiving them,  and VERY BAD CUSTOMER SUPPORT, sadly,  I can\'t give the 5stars I would give if I hadn\'t been ripped off $15. Will happily change my rating if I get my product or money back,  at. After waiting 2 weeks,  I doubt it
reviews.author: Emily walker

reviews.title: Like the game
reviews.comment: I have been playing this game for months and have a ton of prizes but they don\'t help me in the game. Help fix this and I will be more than happy to put this to 5 stars
reviews.author: Jesse Montoya

reviews.title: Where\'s my purchased coins
reviews.comment: Love this game! Definitley will give 5 stars when i get my 1500? coins. Thank you!
reviews.author: Bege Elliott

reviews.title: I recommend it
reviews.comment: Only problem is that you dont get free walls as often and it take for ever to move to the next leve, overall i love it.
reviews.author: A Google User
